Covid-19 has taken so much from us, but now its come for our emojis too.
As a result of the global pandemic, the Unicode Consortium, which sets standards for digital typography, has been forced to delay the next set of updates, from March 2021, when they wer… [+3488 chars]

articles.title: Minecraft Sales Top 200 Million As Developer Mojang Gets A New Logo And Name (Well, Sort Of) - Nintendo Life
articles.description: Impressive monthly player figures, too
articles.content:
In a post on Xbox.com Microsoft has announced that over 200 million copies of Minecraft have been sold to date. Not only that, but 126 million people are playing the game on a monthly basis. That's... a lot of people still playing Minecraft!
